page.title: 08TACK FARM
page.content: Total area..............340acres Arable land.............100acres Grass land..............200acres Woodland.................25acres Other....................15acres Crops...wheat,barley,oats,potatoe silage,hay. Uses for silage........cow food Uses for hay.......young stock food Farm Machinery...1combine,1land-rover 4tractors,3cars. Equipment for....silage, hay-making, baling,fertilising,drilling, ploughing,muck-spreading. Animals....100breeding sheep, 150fattening lambs,80milking cows, 75calves,5horses,1bull,2dogs. Milk a week..............2000galls Buildings..5barns,1milking parlour, 1cattle-shed,1farm-house,2cottages, 1silage-shed. People...7live on farm,3 work.CLASS2
